title: Why does my SIM only get recognised in safe mode?
content:
My phone's SIM only gets recognised in safe mode with a few exceptions.
On startup it gets recognised, (not safe mode) and then after about 30-60mins my phone says: No SIM Card on the quick settings tile and all calling options are gone.

In safe mode the SIM has never disappeared or become unrecognised and I left the phone in safe mode for multiple 12hr+ stints with no issues.

This lead me to remove the "phone" permission from 3rd party apps (no difference).
I also changed to two of my other SIMs (same problem again). 
Interestingly, if I take the SIM out while the phone is still on, I can make it appear again if I insert it very slowly but this only lasts as long as 30-60mins as stated before.

If anyone has any idea what is causing this, any info would be much appreciated, thanks. :)
